hero.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subline: Everything you need to know about working with Julia Studio.
hero.sublineCn: 关于与 Julia Studio 合作，您需要了解的一切。

items.question: What is the design process like?
items.answer: Our process begins with a complimentary consultation. We then develop concepts, refine designs, source materials, and manage the entire installation — from start to reveal.
items.answerCn: 我们的流程从免费咨询开始。然后我们制定概念、完善设计、采购材料并管理整个安装过程——从开始到揭幕。

items.question: How long does a full design project take?
items.questionCn: 完整设计项目需要多长时间？
items.answer: Timelines vary by scope. A room refresh can take 4-6 weeks. A full home redesign typically takes 4-8 months from concept to installation.
items.answerCn: 时间表因范围而异。空间焕新可能需要4-6周。全屋重新设计从概念到安装通常需要4-8个月。

items.question: How does pricing work?
items.answer: Design fees are typically 10-15% of the overall project budget for full-service design. We provide a detailed estimate after our initial consultation.
items.answerCn: 全案设计费用通常为项目总预算的10-15%。初次咨询后，我们将提供详细报价。

items.question: Do you offer virtual design services?
items.questionCn: 你们提供线上设计服务吗？
items.answer: Yes — our virtual design service includes mood boards, space plans, and curated shopping lists. It's perfect for clients outside New York or those with smaller budgets.
items.answerCn: 是的——我们的线上设计服务包括情绪板、空间规划和精选购物清单。非常适合纽约以外的客户或预算较小的客户。

items.question: Can I purchase individual items from the shop?
items.questionCn: 我可以从商店单独购买商品吗？
items.answer: Absolutely. Our shop is open to all customers. You can inquire about any item and we'll guide you through availability, pricing, and lead times.
items.answerCn: 当然可以。我们的商店对所有客户开放。您可以查询任何商品，我们将为您提供库存、价格和交货时间方面的指导。

items.question: Do you offer services in Chinese?
items.answer: Yes — Julia Studio offers complete bilingual service in English and Chinese. All consultations, contracts, and communications can be conducted in your preferred language.
items.answerCn: 是的——Julia Studio 提供完整的中英双语服务。所有咨询、合同和沟通均可以您偏好的语言进行。
